website_summaries.verdict: Keep oil at bay and foundation locked in place for hours with this mattifying primer.
pros: Truly matte finish that lasts throughout the day
Keeps oil from smearing or separating foundation
Tube packaging makes it easy to get every last drop
Minimizes the look of pores and fine lines
Can be worn on its own
cons: Thick formula is not ideal for those with dry skin

website_summaries.verdict: A mattifying primer that proves you don't have to spend a lot of money to prep your face for a shine-free look with or without makeup. Silky formula minimizes pores for a flawless base.
pros: Not only does this affordable matte primer control oil for as long as eight hours, it also reduces the appearance of large pores and looks great under makeup
Can easily be worn alone as well
Feels lightweight on the face, never greasy
cons: Consistency is quite thick, making it a bit challenging to apply
Somewhat drying but that shouldn't be a problem for oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Look at my pic
customer_reviews.text: This cream is no joke no shine is the name they should give this cream. I'm no make up artist on shot summer day I decided to use this and girl let me tell you my face was on point no shine dag I was surprise. I got madd compliments that day
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I want to have a dozen of this so I never run out. I love it so much. Keeps my makeup matte all day.. I couldn't believe it was possible...
customer_reviews.author: nelxy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I think it is a good product. It helps reduce shine, leaves a matte finish, I don't have to blot as much as I did before. I don't apply to the whole face, only to the parts that are prone to oil (t-zone, sides of nose, chin), as otherwise it makes the skin look too dry. For reference, I don't wear foundation, just a bit of powder bronzer on top of this.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The best primer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good primer. I have used others from sephora and need to reapply those or apply powder regularly. With this one, I apply ONCE and follow it with the Rimmel Sty Matte foundation (NO POWDER at all!) and I'm set for the whole day!!! My face is very oily (I'm 32 and still battling with acne) but this primer and the foundation together are a power duo that keep my face normal throughout the day. When I wear it, I don't have to use blotting paper to remove oil or apply any matte powder to combat shine. My skin is matte but not chalky or anything, it's just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when you want to have just a bit of coverage without spending forever in front of the mirror or it's too hot for full face. I use it and a light powder to even up my skin but not melt in the Florida heat. I also have very sensitive skin and I haven't had any problems with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Went from 3 to 5 STARS! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Original comment: "Didnt see a difference between this primer and my original one, angel veil. My skin is veryyy oily, so i was really hoping that "Stay Matte" would help me do just that" THREE STARS UPDATE: i spoke too soon...this primer is FANTASTIC! I didnt notice expected matte skin bc of user error i.e i used an oily moisturizer underneath this primer. Without the moisturizer, i noticed a HUGE dif in my naturally oily skin. It remained matte ALL NIGHT (6+ hours). Could've lasted longer if i didnt have to wash it off. FIVE STARS!!
customer_reviews.author: hyhh

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: I am in the medical field and do the mask on mask off dance all day long, I also am incredibly girly and want to be able to wear my make up, I normally use Mac setting spray and wanted to try a cheap alternative, this works extremely well. Very little transfer to my mask and my make up looks great all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Desirée

customer_reviews.title: Smells Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the refreshing smell of this setting spray, it has a very light fresh cucumber sent. I do feel like it sets my makeup and increases the wear time of foundation, bronzer and blush. Spray on an eyeshadow brush before applying shadow for a heavier pigmented application. Spray small amount on a blender sponge to thin full coverage foundation or concealer. Add 1-2 drops in mascara tube when you think it's empty and get 2-4 more applications out of the tube. Very nice product at a great pricepoint.
customer_reviews.author: JulieM

customer_reviews.title: Value and performance
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like makeup glue! Best setting spray I've ever used. I live in AZ which makes it very hard to keep makeup on your face and this is like Saran wrap but with no clingy feel! Sets makeup ALL DAY! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Vesley

customer_reviews.title: Strange material in and on package
customer_reviews.text: I received my product today, and the bag it was in was filled with little black things that looked like poppy seeds? It was all over the product, so I opened the top and some were inside as well. I have no idea what this is, but now I'm afraid to use it. I would like another one sent to me (without the black stuff) because I really wanted to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spread and dries quick
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to spread, and dry quick, actually I do not notice if really works with sweat because of the AC everywhere but probably works, I have very sensitive skin and I haven't any issue since I'm applying it, just I didn't like as a primer, I didn't feel my skin soft like a regular primer but I like for setting spray
customer_reviews.author: Ana Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Broke me out badly. I developed cystic acne- I'm still battling- on one side of my forehead and on my right temple because of this product. It also stopped controlling oil after about a week or so. Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gia1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Amazing. Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I have been searching my entire life for a product to control my insanely oily skin - I’ve literally tried HUNDREDS (you read that right.. hundreds!) of different products claiming to mattify and control oil and while some of them help, none of them really did what they promised. Until this one! I seriously cannot fully express how much of a religious experience it is for me to look into a mirror at lunch and NOT see a scary, shiny version of the face I saw only a few hours before. This product did that for me. If you’re considering it, just do it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattee primer/setting spray. I love that its multi purpose and it does help control oil. I spray it on before and after i apply my makeup along with coola matte sun screen. I have noticed a reduction on oil. It smells really good, i think its the cucumbers in it. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did not have a shine. However, my skin looked dull and lifeless and I found it drying. I have excellent but mature skin. Very disappointed. Maybe it works for younger skin but I looked drab using it. Rimmel discontinued the “Fix and Perfect” primer that I had happily been using for years. It was an outstanding primer. Rimmel never bothered to respond when I sent an email. Cody (distributor) was disinterested when I phoned to give comments.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.text: As a primer enthusiast, I'm always looking for better products at a bargain price! This primer does the job at fraction of the cost of leading brands. Leaves skin smooth with the ability to go even foundation free.
customer_reviews.author: queenlalis

customer_reviews.title: make up feels refreshed!
customer_reviews.text: like this setting spray it does keep your look of the day flawless and smooth every time used does set your make up back on point!!
customer_reviews.author: amhy01Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Worst primer I’ve ever tried; thicker than paste.
customer_reviews.text: It’s also bright white, which wouldn’t matter if it actually blended into your skin, but it doesn’t. My skin is porcelain so I thought it might work if I mixed the primer with a little of the moisturizer I’d just used on my whole face, but It still wouldn’t absorb, even on the T-zone. There are a lot of great drugstore finds out there but this is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Leopard

customer_reviews.title: Good even without makeup
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it with my foundation on top but I find that unnecessary -- for now. I put this on with the intent to use my foundation on top but my husband said "oh, you already did your makeup" before we were supposed to go out. I can imagine how it looks with foundation but for now, looks great by itself as well.
customer_reviews.author: catdog

customer_reviews.title: This is magic for my face
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I am in my 30s and had never used a primer. As I am starting develop some fine lines, my makeup lady want lasting like it used to. This was the first primer I have tried and it has made such an incredible difference in my skin and has helped my makeup not settle it and last the whole day. When I get home at the end of the day, my makeup still looks fresh and not like it has been in my face 12 hours. I can go somewhere after work and not be afraid of how my makeup looks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wigton

customer_reviews.title: Consistency of thick Elmer's glue.
customer_reviews.text: I've used only silicone-based primers in the past, such as Japonesque, but gave this a try. First thing I noticed was that it is thick and does not glide on easily. I'm used to using a pea-sized amount of primer for my whole face, but this stuff if like putting on thick Elmer's glue. Once on, my makeup (MAC) doesn't go on easily, either. As for helping with oiliness, I can't see that it helps any, unfortunately. Maybe it works for some and not others, since other reviewers like it. At least it is not $$$ so little is lost for giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Works in AZ heat
customer_reviews.text: I buy this all the time to keep from shining like a new Penny all day. I'm in Arizona and it's very hard to keep your makeup from melting like icecream within an hour of putting it on. This definitely does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Boss Lady J

customer_reviews.title: The BEST primer for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: As an extremely oily skin type, I must have the most mattifying of products or my face will be looking like the inside of a pan filled with Crisco. Of all the primers I've tried so far, this is the absolute best! Not only does it mattify the skin, but it actually lasts a decent amount of time. Pretty close to the 8 hours that it claims. And it's an affordable drugstore primer? Yes please. The fact that I can get this for $4-5 is amazing. The fact that it actually works? Even better.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome 👏
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Stays matte all day. I normally have extremely oily/acne prone skin and makeup melts off my face by the end of the day. Not with this stuff. I wear it under makeup and/or alone. It is not a moisturizer, so if you have naturally dry skin wear a moisturizer under it. I think it’s actually making my skin clear up. I have minimal breakouts. It shrinks my pores and keeps a very light invisible protective layer over them which keeps out dirt and oil. Also, it is unscented which is fine by me.
customer_reviews.author: chrebherndon

customer_reviews.title: What did I order this for?
customer_reviews.text: Wow, where to begin. I don't know if I got an old tube or what, but this doesn't blend well, and it leaves a white residue on my face that's just plain horrible. It looks like I took a flour and water mixture and put it on my face, then let dry. This to me was just bizarre. Several reviews remarked upon its effectiveness at controlling oil. I don't have oily skin and didn't buy it for that. I just like having a primer before I put foundation on; this is unacceptable and I won't be using it again, for sure. I really like Rimmel products, too but they dropped the ball on this (IMHO).
customer_reviews.author: maur fingers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a primer I like, this was definitely not it. I got a smaller size in a trial pack I paid for. This did less than nothing and made my makeup worse. Nothing is great about this product, I didn't like the smell, texture, how it spread, I thought it made my makeup look worse with it underneath. This product had no redeeming features.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase - too thick, poor quality, something....
customer_reviews.text: Goes on white, does not massage in easily. It leaves a dry residue feeling. Makeup looked the worst I had ever seen it. I waited to late to try to return. Trashed!
customer_reviews.author: RFH

customer_reviews.title: Really does work, but not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Really works......but it broke me out. Ingredients show there's talc in it. Which is an ingredient that has been used in baby powder and is super absorbent. I believe most baby powders no longer contain talc though. It may have some negative health effects folks are welcome to read up on as I decided to do. I was hoping maybe it would not break me out, I have sensitive skin though. I assume the talc was what clogged my pores. Really wish it didn't Because it did work better than any primer I've tried before. Just not for me, sensitive skin folks might want to pass on this one 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: J. McClintick

customer_reviews.title: No.. I keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this one... The mist is way to clumpy! I guess is the word... It shoots out everywhere out the sides and then 2-3 streams.. it's not a real good mist it's too bunched up in one spray I guess I don't know how to describe it. Not to mention the fact that it burnt my eyes and made my face turn red because of the formula. Smelled like coconutsv which was fine; just burnt face and eyes.. do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Comes on like elmers glue. Makes makeup look heavier than usual. (I used the same amount of foundation as I normally do). Elf primer is the better choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am digging this primer. It does a good job of priming for foundation. It doesn't block as much oil as I would like, but it does help to keep it at bay for a little longer than some others I have tried. I am on my second bottle, and will probably repurchase. I like to add a silicone primer to my cheeks and between my eyes on top of this one, to also minimize pores. *** This primer seems to work best for me if I let it set for about 5 minutes before applying primer.
customer_reviews.author: Shaida EhlertTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and have never liked primers. They either made me more oily or made me breakout. That is until trying this one. The anti-shine is the incredible. Silky smooth application and great coverage with my foundation. Foundation lasted longer and I didn't have to touch up with powder or blotting pads after wearing for several hours. I work on-camera but have not gone back to work yet due to the pandemic. I will update my review after returning to work, to see if this stands up to hot lights.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Puff

customer_reviews.title: Great price and makes skin look clear.
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought an expensive primer from dhc, but my sister told me to try this one. Couldn’t beat the price. I wear this alone...no powder or foundation and I get compliments on my skin looking flawless or clear. I’m 44. I’ll take each and every compliment I can get!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover/Rescuer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and locks in makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this setting spray! and was really excited to get. The mist is really nice, and sprays the product evenly on face with each spritz and it’s really fine too, not like others that spray drops or a stream of product. I set this up for a subscription for every 6 months as you get a better rate that way. Also this does a good job at locking in your makeup, I just have to remember to use as a primer as well lol it also has cucumber extract in it!
customer_reviews.author: Alize V-D

customer_reviews.title: Keeps makeup looking fresh and on point!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle! Although for best results I had to pair it with a moisturizing primer. With that said, using it on top of a second moisturizing primer has been life altering. That is not hyperbole. My makeup now stays on even through perspiration on a muggy Alabama summer day! I no longer even consider putting on my makeup without primer going on first! I've gotten multiple compliments recently from other women commenting that my makeup always looks so perfect and on point and at 52 years old that is nice to hear!
customer_reviews.author: BlueDogsBSK

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Super affordable and works well under too face born this way foundation. If anyone has used that one before they know it starts as matte and ends up being more of a dewy look; the primer keeps it matte. I have normal skin not oily or dry but it even works for dry and oily skin. (I do makeup and used on both skin types)
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Magic!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this finishing spray because it had good reviews. It also was listed at a great price. The first time I used it over my make up was for my daughter’s birthday party and it was in the 90s I sweat all over My face and when I wiped my face NONE of my makeup came off. It looked Flawless all day in the Florida heat. Get yourself some and some for your friends! Seriously, magic.
customer_reviews.author: Abarnes

customer_reviews.title: Spray doesn't mist evenly sprays bigger drops
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why all the reviews are for the cream when this was for the spray primer. I love the cream primer do I bought the setting spray, it doesn't mist evenly or correctly and could actually ruin your makeup with a larger droplet. If the fixed the bottle to must correctly it might be good but until they do that it's pretty much unusable as a setting spray, the cream is better as a primer
customer_reviews.author: XtraX

customer_reviews.title: Not good primer and setting spray
customer_reviews.text: Primer is thick and spray doesnt seem to go on evenly. Worse thing about it is it makes my makeup look weird in a bad way. Makeup looks good u til I use these products. Products gives my face a greyish cast and makes me look dirty. ENHANCES any imperfections on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this primer after reading some of the reviews. I have oily skin, large pores and uneven texture/scarring. This primer worked well, but unfortunately caused some blackheads. I didn’t really notice a difference in my pores either. It is also kind of thick, so you need to apply it quickly, and careful not too use too much. I only use it occasionally since I know I will have blackheads after using it. I will continue searching for the right primer for me.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: THIIIIIICK
customer_reviews.text: I really like this primer, but it is thick like glue. (the one review they SHOULD have actually been asking about thickness for.) It feels thick on your skin, too, but it fills in your pores in a nice way. it is sheer after it is worked in, but looks like glue, and that is why I gave it 4 stars for sheerness. It is also less easy to spread because of its thickness.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy and his Wife

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s lotion based and at first application it kind of left my skin feeling tacky. Wish I would have done more research about matter primers before purchasing. My skin is dry and this matte primer does nothing to hydrate my skin. My foundation did stay on long but it looked dry and cracked on my laugh line area (I did not use setting power). Although I can see how it can work for oily skin types because it’s matte, it’s just not for me that’s why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not great. :/
customer_reviews.text: It is average at best, but works in a pinch! I bought it after noticing that my face was prettyyyy shiny at the end of the work day. However, the product states it works for up to 5 hours. Unfortunately, I noticed shine on my t-zone after just over two hours. Two hours in my cold, element free office..... For the price point (and brand) I knew it wouldn't be extraordinary, but two hours? Meh. I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: LeSpicyBrownCowTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This primer made my skin super dry - it felt like glue going on my face. It made my makeup go on patchy and cakey looking - not attractive at all. I'm better off sticking to using a light moisturizer as a primer. Luckily I got a refund on it which is the o ly reason I'm even giving it two stars. I dont reccomend this even for people with oily skin (like myself). It just ruins your whole look.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Never Buy Urban Decay Ever Again!
customer_reviews.text: Seals makeup like no other! Best setting spray ever. I work in the medical field and wear a mask upwards of 9 hours a day. Absolutely no transfer to my mask. Just spray over foundation and then again after powder and lightly press in with a makeup sponge for all day staying power. And you get 3 oz for less than $4!! Amazing beauty bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie E.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay - I don’t think people who like this have actually tried other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. Is sprays out too hard and not in a spray type of fashion. It’s more of a stream and I hate that. If anything, I spray into my hand a few times and apply it directly to my face that way. Urban Decay’s setting spray is a lot better. It’s a little pricier, but it’s much better quality and has a better, softer spray to it. I’ll stick with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin, BUY this!! This stuff is cheap, you can easily go with a thin layer, and it helps your makeup last all day! My makeup used to last only 3 hours before melting off, but with this stuff on I can do a whole 8 hours stocking and still look good. It's so much cheaper than the other stuff out there. I went through about a bottle a month, though this is quarantine time we're talking about. An absolute steal, I love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of the shine.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had oily skin (face), and have never found a product that combats the oil like this one. I can go all day without having to blot my face, and it is a wonderful feeling not to have to go get blotting papers. It is an excellent product...
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetbabe53

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try a cheaper alternative to my Clinique instant perfector. It goes on smoothly, has no odor, and has an immediate shine reduction but it's very short lived! I guess you get what you pay for because this primer actually made my skin look oilier! After less than an hour, my nose and forehead were very noticeably shiny. I'd rather pay more for Clinique and get a product that actually works all day.
customer_reviews.author: az_mom

customer_reviews.title: No shine!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and can never find a foundation that will last all day. After reading the reviews of this product I decided to try it out and this stuff is amazing! I put it on in the morning and then apply a mineral (powder) foundation and by 5:00pm there’s still no shine! And my mineral base now has real staying power and coverage. I can’t make it through a summer without this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cyncyn

customer_reviews.title: No thank u
customer_reviews.text: Went on ok but my makeup didn’t even last but an hour, it seemed to help my powder foundation just melt off my face. Not good for oily/combo skin or powder foundation. Rather have zero primer than this product
customer_reviews.author: Mamas

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly inhale the grossest and most oily skin even and this product worked for me ... i do my makeup around 8 am and by noon my face is so oily I need to powder again (and it creates this crust of powder I’ve always hated it ) but now I can literally go the whole day with a matte face ... honestly my makeup is not even cheaper is actually lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very matte
customer_reviews.text: I have an oily t-zone and this product absolutely controls the shine and keeps makeup from smearing . It does however, seem to dry out the under eye area making small wrinkles more obvious. So make sure you moisturize before using. It goes a long way, so use just a dab. I use a dot and mix a dot of foundation on my fingers before applying. Perfect for primer on eyelids as well. TIP.... dab on when applying vs. rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: jdsings

customer_reviews.title: Applies poorly but works well
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on the setting spray. It applies very awkwardly in the way that it applies more like a stream than a mist. It also have an odd smell that I think is suppose to be cucumber. However, I have to admit this works really well when it comes to setting my makeup. I have oily skin particularly on my nose and around my mouth and I’ve noticed that my makeup has not been smudging off onto my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews I thought I'd give it a try. Unfortunately it did nothing for me. Seems to make creases more noticable. I have combination skin and this was drying. Defintely not recommended for people with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: smile4life

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use for a bridal party of 8 that I had to do for a wedding. The majority of the bridesmaids and the bride was oily. I used this along with some of my other tricks and they stayed dry the entire night along with their makeup. Sometimes you don’t need really expensive products. It all has to do with your skin preparation. I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Not just for lady. Works perfect on guy too.
customer_reviews.text: So why a guy review this product you might ask. Well I got oily skin. At the middle of my work day my face will shine like a disco ball. I had used many primer before from expensive to cheap. It’s not the best but for this price it is a great value and will keep me matted pretty much the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny L

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for easing facial oiliness.
customer_reviews.text: Short version: It works. Longer version: If you're really oily, you will eventually need to reapply, but it was hours before I started feeling like my skin was getting oily again. You'd probably make it through most of a normal day before reapplying, but that depends on your oil level, and how much you tend to touch your face or rub it, or what you're doing. It isn't drying, is colorless and absorbs well, and is effective. It's a nice product, and it's very helpful on my oilier days.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin so this usually lasts until midday before I have to blot, but it still lasts longer than other primers I have used. And you can't beat this price! I am not one to spend a lot of money on makeup so this works for me! It's easy to spread, but I wouldn't say it's moisturizing. When applied I feel like it soaks up whatever is on the skin, which is what I thought it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Works almost too well!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin but I actually have to put a little moisturizer on under this because it sometimes works too well and makes the make up look obvious or cakey...however I will definitely order it again now that I know to moisturize under. It works great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Not ok for me on its own, too drying but mattifies very well!
customer_reviews.text: This dries out my skin A LOT... also you have to use a lot because it dries out SO quick you barely have time to spread it out. It DOES however keep your skin matte so if you have EXTREMELY (not somewhat, extreme!) oily skin, this is for you. Otherwise I still have to use my hydrating primer underneath this primer..
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make a difference
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I noticed when I sprayed this stuff on my face before or after I put my makeup on was that my face got wet for a while before it dried. I did not see a difference in my makeup at all. And it seemed like I had to spray at least 10-15 times to feel it covered my face totally.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again, needs a new nozzle design
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the nozzle leaves a little to be desired. I have another brand of setting spray that offers a finer mist which I prefer. This mist droplets on this are little bigger and my face feels wet rather than refreshingly damp after usage. I’ve poured this product into the mister from my Avon bottle setting spray for the finer mist.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ulibarri

customer_reviews.title: Favorite primer!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several drugstore primers, and this is undoubtedly my favorite! It stays matte, doesn't cause acne, and actually hydrates my skin. I wear it daily, and one tube lasts about 2 months. Unlike other primers I've used (Wet 'n Wild, Neutrogena, etc.), a little goes a long way. I wear it under NYX BB Cream. Without it, the BB cream wears off instantly, but with the primer it goes on more smoothly, has better longevity, and attains greater coverage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Wilderdyke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face primer for oily skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this primer does not play. This primer withstood a day of running around, and sweating, and yet my makeup still looked flawless. This is NOT a primer for those with dry skin because it keeps the skin super SUPER matte. If you have oily skin GET THIS and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: ... skin and the humidity in South Florida makes it worse. I am not the kind of lady that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and the humidity in South Florida makes it worse. I am not the kind of lady that has time during work to reapply my make up several times a day but wanted help with oil control. This product is really good. It lasts for me about 5-6 hours with little to no shine. I have purchased it again. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Mcfab

customer_reviews.title: super oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and honestly the best I’ve had so far! I used the the primer by rimmel; I also apply setting powder prior to putting on the foundation and then after the finish look I applied this spray. It last 6 hours before I had to freshen up.
customer_reviews.author: Maite_LuVana

customer_reviews.title: The only primer needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin in the t-zone area. This product is excellent in keeping the shine off without the constant blotting I had grown accustomed to. After washing and moisturizing my face, I dab a little in the t-zone area and no shine all day! A little goes a long way! I wear it with, and without foundation. It works as an excellent primer when I wear makeup and it gives me a flawless, poreless finish! It is also reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: TheVocalHeart

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think this was a good product choice. I felt like this product was easy to apply and really made my skin feel smooth. You only need to use a small amount to get a good coverage so the 1oz tube will last a while. I used this as the base layer in my daily makeup routine and I think it did a great job under my foundation. I will definitely consider buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... this is the only makeup I wear (plus a good liquid eyeliner) and it keeps my face matte and ...
customer_reviews.text: I work 8-12 hours each day and this is the only makeup I wear (plus a good liquid eyeliner) and it keeps my face matte and oil-free. I only need to apply it once in the morning and when I come home at night, I still look fresh.
customer_reviews.author: M. Louise C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a low cost primer
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a low cost primer. I enjoy the texture, it applies very smooth. I have very large pores and not even the more expensive products provide any more coverage than this,so why spend any more money. My skin is acne prone and I have not has any problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Su Urbu

customer_reviews.title: very affordable, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a sample once from a makeup subscription. It can get very humid where I live in the summer. This primer worked surprisingly well! Even with my busiest of days, it helped keep the makeup matte so I wasn't all shiny at the end of the day. I loved it so much I bought more I was sad when I used it all up.
customer_reviews.author: coyk

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does...and a good price too
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product to keep my makeup in place during my lunch time walks. Sweat is terrible for eyeliner. So far this has held up pretty to some of the warmest days off summer! I will buy this product again. Note: If you have olive or darker skin.. It does leave my skin looking slightly pale and you may have to use a darker foundation...but, that is the only draw back.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Gaudieri

customer_reviews.title: Oily girls look no further
customer_reviews.text: This product will definitely be going in my holy grail. In a 12 hour span, I went to 2 different parties, 1 being hot and crowded, and I only had minimal shine afterwards. A quick blot with oil absorbing sheets and I was good to go the rest of the day! By the time I was home, my make up was still flawless and not oily. I was so shocked. I've searched so long for a matte primer that was not as expensive as Becca and I've finally found it.
customer_reviews.author: Parkher

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used this product I was hesitant because of the price being so low and over the counter product but omg! I was very happily surprised. It smells delicious and it feels so good on my face and so far it has kept my makeup perfect all day long. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works well with oily skin! I’m surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very surprised and pleased with this product and I’m a touch critic. I have very oily/shiny skin. No acne, but just always oily and usually have to blot my face multiple times throughout the day. I just tried this product for the first time and it’s great! Have had it on for about 5hrs now and am much more matte and noticeably less shiny than ever. I highly recommend. I don’t think this should substitute your face lotion but I think applying it with an oil free moisturizer is a win win. Definitely incorporating this into my daily routine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Primer/facial moisturizer/setting spray.
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this product just as a daily moisturizing routine. The spray is very good and has lasted me quite awhile like 3 weeks for one bottle. I love it as a primer before i decide to put makeup on and it makes the makeup cling better to my face. I also like to wear it as a setting spray as well. It leaves my face feeling as if i just applied my make up but its been hours after ive done so. I have bought 3 bottles so far and will continuously do so cause its amazing! Thank u!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Powers

customer_reviews.title: shine be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this stuff. I have been using Maybellene Baby skin primer, this does not make my skin as soft but does the same thing. It goes on pretty easily and dried quickly. After 5 hours of wear I have no shine on my face and I normally need to use oil sheets by now! So it works as it says it should. The pore reducing factor I am not sold on and fortunately at this point I don't have wrinkles to try it on either. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stum

customer_reviews.title: It’s not Expensive but it’s Great
customer_reviews.text: A great value and an excellent primer. I’ve used very high priced primers, and this one works just as well in my opinion. I use retinol cream, followed by TruC moisturizer, then this primer and no foundation is needed for me. When I do add foundation for a night out, I’ve noticed that my complexion is smooth and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the price...but boy was I surprised! No shine all day! I couldn't believe it! I've tried so many different types of primers to try and achieve this...I've finally found one! You won't be disappointed especially if you're oily like me.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is now my to go to for prime and then after make up is finish to set. It’s like amazing seriously one of the best products I’ve used in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a refreshing product. It did not last through a 75 degree day. My "face" melted Pretty quickly. I've tried it as both a primer and a setting spray and I definitely like it better as a setting spray but still doesn't hold much in place on a warm day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this a try and was pleasantly surprised. I don’t wear makeup often but wanted to try something I could wear alone that would help even my skin tone without melting in the Florida heat and humidity. This works really well. The before and after pics in the description are pretty accurate. I have sensitive skin but I haven’t had any irritation from this. I recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin, especially around the forehead and nose area. When I apply this awesome STAY MATTE, even in 110 degree Vegas heat it stays put with no shine. So glad I found it, and thanks to Amazons reviewers they helped me to decide with their positive reviews. I just ordered another one so I won't run out :)
customer_reviews.author: BEAUTYMISTI

customer_reviews.title: Great finishing spray
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly for the price. I have watery eyes and my eyeshadow gets messed up constantly so I thought this would help. It is amazing. I put my eyeshadow on spray and go and it stays on all day and my watering eyes no longer make my eyeshadow wear off. I love this and will continue to wear it daily. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jakesmom5

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Well, it does feel moisturizing but I did not see any difference in oil reduction or shine. I think this actually made my face oily more quickly than if I didn't use this. At least it smells nice. I prefer to use the Rimmel Stay Matte cream primer version. That one works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great!!! I have very oily skin and it seems like my make up just melts off, but this keeps it in place. For it to be so cheap it's just as good as the more expensive brands. I don't have to alot until maybe 8-9 hours after initial apply. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Neal

customer_reviews.title: Didnt do much for me
customer_reviews.text: I didnt really like this primer, it didnt seem to do much for my own skin. Everyone has different skin though, so it might work differently for you. You have to try things yourself to know how they will work on your own skin.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Will likely not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: It feels as if it's going to be "moisturizing" when you first out it on. When it dries it leaves a ghostly/chalky look to your face. I've noticed a SLIGHT reduction of oil in my T zone. I've tried it with and without powder foundation. I'm going to play around with it and see if I can make it work. I think I'm going to stick with clear colored primers...
customer_reviews.author: Bradberry

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Works great for coverage with my oily skin. You will have to find your own personal combo for your individual skin type. Some foundations, powders and setting sprays did not mesh well with it, but it is awesome once you find your combination! It is my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: A.Foll

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin and this thing keeps me matte for hours! I can do my makeup in the morning around 7 and I'm still matte by 3. When my oil does start to peek through, it looks natural and doesn't cake up or separate. My only issue is you have to apply it all over your face. If you don't, you will be able to tell where the edge of the primer is when you apply foundation. Besides that, this stuff works magic for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that I don't know how I managed putting on my face, especially in warm weather months without this. It keeps your makeup in place with minimal shine and barely any transfer. I LOVE this.. you have a customer for life..
customer_reviews.author: ThaButterz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - feels great
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything bad about this stuff. So far so good. Haven't noticed any huge changes in skin, but it has not hurt my face. It feels great when putting on , spreads so nicely. Great stuff for the price and look forward to seeing what a month of use results in.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Department store quality products
customer_reviews.text: I have found the holy grail of reasonable priced setting spray. I used the combination of the Rimmel primer and setting spray, after 81/2 hours of wear I only had to touch up my makeup with powder one time. I have sensitive skin and I haven't broke out , I have used the products on 6 different occasions. This setting spray and the primer are great products.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly sands

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer allows to large a droplet of product . Used it further away and it didn't change the fact that I saw no difference. I also put product on a sponge and dabbed in the under eye area where moisturizer often shines . I did see a slight difference.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hendriks

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: This primer 😍 all of idk 7$? I did a photo shoot in a sunflower field in the end of July in 90 degree weather all while tangling two kids and my makeup stayed perfect until I went to take off my face for the night
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, it is pretty thick
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far, used it a few days now. I don't like that it is so thick, but I can get over that if it works well. It seems to protect my makeup fairly well in the shower and I actually had to wash to get it to come off. For the price I am satisfied! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with this “pore reducing” product.
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this product; there are a lot of “pore reducing” products out there so I did some research prior to purchase. I’m frugal so I also shopped around prior to purchase and I’m very happy with price, quality and service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska girl

customer_reviews.title: This little tube is amazing. It instantly takes the shine off of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This little tube is amazing. It instantly takes the shine off of my face; even when the shine is because I have clean skin. It is an awesome primer for under foundation. The primer has no color. Goes on completely clear then dries. Not heavy at all. I bartend weekends in Florida and it keeps my foundation locked down even when I perspire.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Super great
customer_reviews.text: Super great! Gives my skin that healthy glow I was looking for! Arrived with same day and shipping which is an added bonus point!
customer_reviews.author: SoaringEagle

product_meta.title: Rimmel Stay Matte Primer, 1 Ounce (1 Count), Makeup Primer, Refines Pores, Stops Shine, Smooths Skin, For Use Under Makeup or as a Standalone Skin Mattifying Product
product_meta.description: Style Name:primer| Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Want the London look? Begin your day flawlessly. If you want to mattify oily skin, minimise the appearance of pores, or even out skin tone, Rimmel London’s Stay Matte Primer does it all while also creating a velvety base for makeup that helps it stay put all day. This skin perfecting primer can be worn alone, under, or on top of makeup. The ultra lightweight formula never feels heavy or greasy and controls shine for up to 8 hours, creating a soft, perfectly matte complexion. Best of all, it doesn’t clog pores or irritate skin. If you have dry skin with oily patches, try Stay Matte Primer to smooth and moisturise your skin before putting on your other makeup. Apply a small amount before applying foundation. It can be especially useful on your under-eye area to minimize pores. Pat it on, then blend in the primer over your entire face and neck, basically anywhere that will get foundation or concealer. To help your foundation or BB cream last a lot longer with less shine, Rimmel London’s Stay Matte Primer is a smart addition to your makeup kit. A lovely gift for a girlfriend, sister or even your mum. Rimmel London is an inner confidence that how we look is always cool, irreverent, never predictable and always evolving. Rimmel is not perfection or intimidating, it is like London: young, urban, eclectic, edgy. It is expression with no rules, it is real, it is accessible. Live the London look.
feature_bullets: Controls shine for up to 8 hours

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
